    • 方法详细资料

      • apply

        public ACC apply(ACC previousState,
                 T value)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: StateTransformationFunction
        Binary function that applies a given value to the given old state to compute the new state.
        指定者:
        apply 在接口中 StateTransformationFunction<ACC,T>
        参数:
        previousState - the previous state that is the basis for the transformation.
        value - the value that the implementation applies to the old state to obtain the new state.
        返回:
        the new state, computed by applying the given value on the given old state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong in applying the transformation function.
